actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Belch Fire {@recharge 4}
entries: The stove belches fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
